TopicTitle: Treachery, Vengeance, and Kerbals: Flight of the Kerbalight

Articles.Content:
A revolutionary new Kerbal-powered propulsion system.

A highly-anticipated corned beef sandwich.

Two Kerbals.

Such is the recipe for treachery. Watch the sordid tale unfold in "Flight of the Kerbalight"!

(I'm not a patch on Nassault, so don't expect that level of polish. This is my first real story told in video. I learned a ton!)
